biotools.summary: LOT (Linkage analysis of Ordinal Traits) is a software program that performs linkage analysis of ordinal traits for pedigree data. It implements a latent-variable proportional-odds logistic model that relates inheritance patterns to the distribution of the ordinal trait.

bioschemas.name: LOT
